[APT41 DUST](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0040) was conducted by [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) from 2023 to July 2024.(Citation: Google Cloud APT41 2024)

[HEXANE](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1001) probed victim infrastructure in support of [HomeLand Justice](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0038).(Citation: Microsoft Albanian Government Attacks September 2022)

[Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) used [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) to build intermediate communication chains between operators and victims, such as identified access to victims in Guam.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

[Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) was conducted by [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) between June and August 2024.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)
